title: Are there any reasons NOT to switch over to Kite's GD?
body:
I don't just mean me, I mean all of us.

http://genericdiscussion.freeforums.net/board/1/general-board%22

Why shouldn't we? This place is worse off than ever in regards to traffic, moderation, freedom of speech, and entertainment value.

EDIT: Downvotes from people assuming the wrong thing. I linked it but have never posted there or done more than briefly browse the front page. Not trying to start a flame war. This board has just gone nowhere but downhill since the split. I saw dozens of "gd is dead no one browsing" posts this week so I'm not saying anything new.

But apparently most of you think very little of those people so thats my answer.
